content: the **limestone one skein triangle shawl knitting pattern knits up fast** and only uses **400 yards** of fingering weight serenity 20 and a size us 6/4 mm or size needed to get gauge needle the pattern is lovely knit up in a solid color variegated or semi-solid yarn the pattern includes written instructions as well as charts it has been test knit and tech edited and is presented in a clear manner this as an intermediate beginner level pattern yarn substitution may result in a change in estimated yardage gauge and finished size of your individual project **description** this quick-to-knit triangle lace shawlette is simple and elegant with its lovely knit-on lace edging **needles** size us 6/4 mm knitting needles or size needed to get gauge **yarn** one 109 gram ball of zen yarn garden s serenity 20 70% superwash merino 20% cashmere 10% nylon 400 yards/367 meters total yardage 336 yards/ 308 meters **gauge** 20 stitches and 32 row over 4 inches in main body stitch **finished pattern measurements** 52 inches wide by 20 inches long after blocking **supplies** removable stitch marker yarn needle for weaving in ends blocking aids optional
